name: Xolotl: Journey of the Souls
description:
This is DEATH...
This is the JOURNEY OF THE SOULS to the heavens...
You, the chosen one, the offering we send...
Guide the souls to their paradise, XOLOTL...
We beg you...

CONTROLS:
🡰 A (LEFT)  - W (JUMP) 🡱 -  (RIGHT) D 🡲
SPACE TO INTERACT    Q - E (SOULS SWITCH)
